name: Brave Sword
overview: Brave Sword is an RPG game that takes place in the land of Memphis, and at the beginning the player can choose between a male or female character (both can be customizables), in his quest it will have the help of another 2 adventures Mary & Los. By default the surname of the character is Noel. The player begins his quest in a town where he can buy new weapons, items and armors, and also go around and try to get new quest to earn more gold to buy new things. In the town the game uses a first person perspective and in the missions the graphics change to a 3d view in which the player can give orders to the characters. During the battles the player have to click over each of the character and after that he can give him different orders like go to different place of the floor, attack, defend, increase or decrease speed of each character, etc.
